page.title: 11MY DAY BY CAROLINE WORT
page.content: On Monday 29th April,I woke up & got out of bed at 7.00,a bed is a soft piece of furniture you sleep on.I went downstairs for breakfast I had wheatabix which is wheat pressed together in an oblong shape.I had a piece of toast,which is bread toasted & bread is a mixture or flour and other ingrediants made into a dough.Breakfast is a meal you have when you wake up.I went back upstairs to my room I put on my clothes which was a blue skirt & a pink short sleeved top.I went downstairs to go to school.In the morning I did maths.At playtime I played with my friends. I wnet back home hoping it would snow again. I went back home hoping it would snow again.At home I put the television on & watched a cartoon.My dad came home,we had tea.I had a wash,at 8.30 I went to bed.
